name: Ubuntu Server 12.04 LTS (Precise Pangolin)
description:
This image has been created with OpenNebula 3.4. It has been tested with KVM, although since it's a RAW image it should work with Xen and even VMware (using qemu-img convert).

The login information for this VM is

login: ubuntu
password: ubuntu

It has been prepared to work with OpenNebula, i.e. it's contextualized.
